item.description:
Hello,

 

Have a Good Day’

Hope you are doing well.

Want more clients andcustomers.

 

We will help them find youby putting you on the 1st page Of Google.

We have some specialoffers.

 

If you are interested inincreasing your online business and reputation kindly share these details withus:-

2. Your targetarea/location, __________________________________?

3. Keywords (if you have),____________________________________________________? [...]
item.author: Ruby

item.title: Re: broken link on webpage
item.description:
Thanks for the heads up Matthew, someone will take a look at that. Not the best introduction for someone wanting to participate or contribute! I find the same problems so its not your browser for sure.

I think the participate link is probably to link to https://dawnsci.org/develop/contributing/

Don't hesitate to let us know if you find any other problems [...]
item.author: Alun.Ashton@diamond.ac.uk

item.title: broken link on webpage
item.description:
Hi

Just to let you know that on the page https://dawnsci.org/contact-us/, there is a link to participate in the collaboration https://dawnsci.org/collaborate.

It gives a 404 error.

I tried to send this through the contact-us page, but I got "An error occurred while sending your message"

I'm using Chrome 67 on Windows 7 64.

Matthew

Matthew Rowles
PhD
X-Ray Diffraction and Scattering Facility Leader | John de Laeter Centre [...]
item.author: Matthew Rowles
